item.title: Apache Hop 2.13 is available!!
item.description: After about two months of work on 84 tickets by 8 contributors, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.13.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible. Â Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.13 brings: Multiple GCP Storage locations MySQL Bulk Loader Transform Various improvements Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.
